name: Ajar Online Holdings, Ltd.
description: Provider of a cloud based property management platform intended to offer a quick and secure online rent collection process. The company's platform uses property management tools, enabling tenants to pay their rent online, at any time and anywhere via SMS and email in less than 60 seconds.
one_liner: Provider of a cloud based property management platform intended to offer a quick and secure online rent collection process.
